description: Numb. fols. 20.6 x 13.5 cm.; written surface 13.2 x 7 cm.; 15 lines to page; on glazed European paper; in Fārisi; with catchwords; with rubrications. A commentary on Shudhūr al-dhahab, the authorʼs poem on alchemy. This commentary is the recension of Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Anṣārī, the authorʼs disciple. Beg.: بسم الله ... سألت ... ابو الحسن علي بن موسى Colophon: فلم اتوقف کتوقف جعفر لجابر بل بادرت واجبت عما سئلت وما توفىقي الا بالله وهو حسبي ونعم الوکىل Marginal notes and glosses. On last page and 27 folios following is a collection of notes on alchemy. MS in good condition but worm-eaten; Arabic leather binding with flap; gilt stamped and tooling on cover and flap. Probably from XVIIth century. Acquired from Bārūdī, Beirūt, A.D. 1925. Ahlwardt, Verzeichnis der arabischen Handschriften, 4182; Rosen, Les manuscrits arabes de l'Institut des langues orientales, 201.
author: Ibn Arfaʻ Raʼs, ʻAli ibn Mūsá, d. 1197
